parameters.name: DatasetName
parameters.description: The name of the dataset. For more information, see [Create a dataset](~~478160~~).

parameters.name: From
parameters.description: The ID of the source group. You must specify either From or Froms, but not both.

parameters.name: Froms
parameters.description: The IDs of source clustering groups. You must specify either From or Froms, but not both. You can specify up to 100 task IDs.

parameters.name: Notification
parameters.description: The notification settings. For information about the asynchronous notification format, see [Asynchronous message examples](~~2743997~~).

parameters.name: ProjectName
parameters.description: The name of the project. For more information, see [CreateProject](~~478153~~).

parameters.name: Tags
parameters.description: The custom tags, which can be used to search for and filter asynchronous tasks.

parameters.name: To
parameters.description: The ID of the destination clustering group.

parameters.name: UserData
parameters.description: The custom data, which is returned in an asynchronous notification and facilitates notification management. The maximum length is 2,048 bytes.
